This page collects **optional articles, essays, videos, and interactive resources**
that connect probability, statistics, and data science to real applications,
historical context, or broader ideas.

- [qmcpy.org: A Python Library for Quasi-Monte Carlo Methods](https://qmcpy.org/)
  - A Python library for quasi-Monte Carlo methods, which are used to improve the efficiency of numerical integration and simulation

- [Rankings of Computer Languages](https://www.tiobe.com/tiobe-index/)
  - A ranking of programming languages based on their popularity and usage in the industry
  - Statistical questions include: What are the errors in the percentages? What is the significance of a change in rank?
